events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer’s message about receiving the wrong item.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist the customer with their refund request.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also send a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue more quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the info. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate how fast you're handling this.
The refund has been initiated and your case is now considered resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund successfully and if everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we haven’t heard otherwise, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
